hero.title: Master the SERU Test
hero.description: Prepare yourself for the TFL SERU Assessment with our comprehensive course designed to help you understand Safety, Equality, and Regulatory Understanding. Our course covers everything you need to pass the computer-based test and become a certified PCO driver.

StepSection.title: Book Appointment
StepSection.description: You can begin your PCO licence by booking an appointment on a Thursday evening.

StepSection.title: Medical Check
StepSection.description: You will undergo a TPH204 TFL medical test to ensure you're fit to drive. Our in-house GP will check your medical history and complete your medical.

StepSection.title: Topographical Training
StepSection.description: You will undergo 3 hours of Topographical skills training. We will show you the format of the test and how to navigate and read the London A-Z map.

StepSection.title: Final Steps
StepSection.description: We will complete all necessary application forms and file your application directly to TFL. We will complete everything, making the process hassle-free and simple.

SomethingAboutUs.SomethingAboutUsTitle: Completing your PCO licence will be hassle free.
SomethingAboutUs.SAUD: For only £545 with all fees included, we are the cheapest and one of London's only all in one PCO Licence centres where you can complete your topographical training, TPH 204 medical check and have your TFL PCO application correctly filled in and filed by us. We completely take the headache and stress out of the PCO application process.

StatSection.find: Find out more about the test
StatSection.TopographicalTitle: Topographical Theory Practice and Mock Test
StatSection.TopographicalDescription: This Topographical Theory test is provided to acquaint you with the format of the official test. You are advised to familiarise with the official A-Z Atlas handbook before attempting the test. The test consists of 25 questions for 25 marks; each question carrying 1 mark.Click the button below to start the test.

MockTestSection.testDescription: We strongly advise you to read the handbook before starting our practice tests.

promiseSection.promiseDescription: We’ve helped thousands of people pass their topographical test. Here’s how we’re going to make you pass too!

promiseCardContent.title: Realistic Tests
promiseCardContent.description: All of our questions are designed to closely match real test questions. We’ll make sure that there are no surprises at the test centre.

promiseCardContent.title: Progress Tracking
promiseCardContent.description: Check your test results to see your progress and stay on track. Re-do the tests you’ve failed and gain confidence from the ones you’ve passed.

promiseCardContent.title: Self Paced
promiseCardContent.description: All of our material is available to you from the very beginning. Study at your own speed and rest assured, we’re here to help every step of the way.

promiseCardContent.title: Convenient
promiseCardContent.description: Read the handbook or complete our mock tests from any place, any device, any time. We are live 24/7 so you can prepare whenever you want.

ourCourseSection.CourseShortDes: Choose the best plan that fits your needs. Our courses are designed to help you learn at your own pace.

CourseCards.title: Basic Course
CourseCards.description: Everything you need to get started.

CourseCards.title: Professional Course
CourseCards.description: Level up with advanced features and support.

CourseCards.title: Expert Course
CourseCards.description: Gain expert knowledge and premium support.

BlogSectionHeader.blogHeaderDes: Here you can keep yourself updated by reading our blogs on the various topics ranging from licenses to other relevant topics. You can also subscribe to us in order to keep yourself informed of our services.

GIT.gitShortTitle: Send us a message to enquire or book an appointment !
GIT.gitMain: If you have any queries about us or about our services, do not hesitate to ping us a question of any kind using the below form.
GIT.Have: Have questions about the PCO Licence process or need assistance? We’re here 24/7 to help you. Reach out to us via phone, email, or visit our office.

coursePage.includes: This course includes over 500 SERU assessment questions including MultiChoice, Drag & Drop, and reading & understanding exercises.
coursePage.availablePlatforms: Available on all platforms - Mobile Phones, PCs, Tablets
coursePage.continueFromWhereYouLeftOff: Continue the course from where you left off
coursePage.practiceQuestions: Practice questions with interactive answer hints
coursePage.Platform: Our platform is perfect for all drivers - no need to take days off or attend classes. Simply buy one of our courses and learn whenever you like!
coursePage.created: Courses created by ex-TfL assessors with 7+ years of experience.
coursePage.study: Study at your own pace with 24/7 access to our resources.
coursePage.watch: WATCH OUR INTERACTIVE COURSE OVERVIEW VIDEO BELOW!

features.title: All TfL SERU Handbook Sections Covered
Repeat as Many Times as You Want

AboutUs.acceleration: Accelerating the private hire licence application process and delivering high-quality training to ensure first-time exam success.
AboutUs.support: At London PCO Licence and Training Centre, we have supported over 500 individuals in obtaining their PHV drivers’ licence.
AboutUs.experience: Our 5+ years of expertise ensure a smooth and guided process tailored to each applicant’s needs.
AboutUs.flexibility: A private hire driver licence offers flexibility and independence. However, obtaining one requires navigating a complex application process, and we provide structured assistance to simplify this journey.
AboutUs.training: Our comprehensive training programs align with TFL assessments, ensuring a streamlined learning experience that maximizes success rates.
AboutUs.methodology: We leverage cutting-edge training methodologies and real-world simulations to prepare candidates effectively for TFL exams and beyond.
AboutUs.commitment: Our commitment to excellence and what sets us apart.
AboutUs.Expediting: Expediting licence applications with meticulous document processing and follow-ups.
AboutUs.Delivering: Delivering an individualized learning experience tailored to different needs and skill levels.
AboutUs.Offering: Offering unlimited access to our advanced SERU software for comprehensive test preparation.
AboutUs.Providing: Providing career guidance post-licensing, helping candidates secure roles with top industry employers.
AboutUs.Comprehensive: Comprehensive support covering all TFL requirements under one streamlined package.
AboutUs.simulations: One-on-one computer-based training with real TFL exam simulations.
AboutUs.Customized: Customized individual and group training sessions to master topographical skills.
AboutUs.coaching: Comprehensive coaching to ensure topographical test success on the first attempt.
AboutUs.Highly: Highly experienced trainers guiding you through every step of the process.
AboutUs.Advanced: Advanced TFL-guided software ensuring structured and effective learning.

allVideo.Watch: Watch our expert-led video lessons to master the UK PCO Licence Exam. Gain in-depth knowledge, practical tips, and step-by-step guidance to help you succeed!
